thread.title: A nostalgic song from Rani Padmini
thread.title_full: A nostalgic song from Rani Padmini - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: A nostalgic song from Rani Padmini
text:
The first song of the much-awaited Aashiq Abu film, Rani Padmini, is just out.
Written by Rafeeq Ahmed and scored by Bijibal, the song Marivillin Peeliveezhumaa... is quite a mood lifter. Devdutt, Shwetha Mohan and Lola lend their voices to the track featured on the life of two little girls, who seem to be playing the childhood of its lead actresses, Manju Warrier and Rima Kallingal.
